alert.note: Alert for Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Laurens and western Treutlen Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lowery, or 9 miles west of Soperton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Soperton, Lothair, Orland, Rockledge, Orianna, Lowery and Barnhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
